== Cavorim (626910) ==

Cavorim is a village in the [[Salcete]] taluka of [[South Goa]] district with an area of 498 hectares and harbouring 576 households with total population of 2228 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[MARGAO]] is at a distance of 12 km. Male population is 1031 and female population is 1197. Scheduled Caste Population is 22 and Scheduled Tribes population is 54. Census Location Code of the village is 626910<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
